Package cards.action_cards.collect_from_player

Class ItsYourBirthday

java.lang.Object
cards.Card
cards.ActionCard
cards.action_cards.CollectFromPlayer
cards.action_cards.collect_from_player.ItsYourBirthday
All Implemented Interfaces:
MachineRandom
public class ItsYourBirthday
extends CollectFromPlayer
Class implementing an It's Your Birthday action card, which asks the player to collect money from all the other players, equivalent to the birthday gift indicated in this card

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ItsYourBirthday()
    Creates an It's Your Birthday action card object

  • Constructor Details

    • ItsYourBirthday

      public ItsYourBirthday()
      Creates an It's Your Birthday action card object

      In particular, an It's Your Birthday card has its attributes initialized as follows:

      • Its name is "It's Your Birthday".
      • The lower bound for the birthday gift is $5000.
      • The upper bound for the birthday gift is $20000.
      • The increment for the birthday gift is $1000.

      The bounds and the increments were decided upon by the programmers.

      The constructor of the parent class takes care of the initialization of the birthday gift.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute​(Player currPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, Bank b)
      Executes the action specified in this card, that is, the player collects money from all the other players, equivalent to the birthday gift indicated in this card
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      players - ArrayList containing all the players in the game
      b - Bank of the game

    • getInfo

      public java.lang.String getInfo()
      Returns the card description to be displayed as a prompt during the actual gameplay

      In particular, the card description reads as follows: "It's your birthday! Collect [birthday gift] from every other player as a gift."

      Specified by:
      getInfo in class ActionCard
      Returns:
      card description to be displayed as a prompt during the actual gameplay

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this card, which includes its name and the amount it instructs the player to collect from all the other players.

      In particular, the representation contains the following details:

      • Type of card (Action card)
      • Name of the card (It's Your Birthday)
      • The header "Amount Collected from Other Player" (which is a general description of the Collect from Player category of action cards)
      • The birthday gift as the amount collected from every other player
      Overrides:
      toString in class CollectFromPlayer
      Returns:
      string representation of this card
